scripts.e2e-ios-build: (cd ios && xcrun xcodebuild -scheme 'Maestro' -workspace 'Maestro.xcworkspace' -configuration Debug -sdk 'iphonesimulator' -destination 'generic/platform=iOS Simulator' -derivedDataPath build)
scripts.e2e-ios-test: source .env && xcrun simctl install Booted ios/build/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/maestro.app && maestro --device $E2E_IOS_DEVICE_ID test e2e/scripts/main.e2e.yaml
scripts.e2e-android-test: source .env && adb install android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk &&  maestro --device $E2E_ANDROID_DEVICE_ID test e2e/scripts/main.e2e.yaml
